item.title: How can i make timers for weapons when pking
item.dc:creator: @r3d_th3m3 r3d_th3m3
item.description:
@r3d_th3m3 wrote:

This is easy
Search for:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) // whip
{
PkingDelay = #;//change 
wepdelay = #;//change
}

There are a lot of codes like that.
Search until you find something that looks like it.
Shouldnâ€™t take long.
Add it right under one of the codes you just found.
Save - compile - done
